DOC.brief_summary: Describe the patient population and bacterial microbiology of pediatric patients presenting with spontaneous draining acute otitis media
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Microbiological Analysis of Spontaneous Draining Acute Otitis Media
DOC.criteria: Main inclusion criteria: Children >= 2 months and =< 5 years Spontaneous draining AOM =< 2 days Main exclusion criteria: Previous operation of the ear Chronic otitis media or tube placement with drainage >= 3 days Chronic disease/immune deficiency
